title: Harmonized Index of Consumer Prices: Energy for European Union (27 countries from 2020)
notes:
The Harmonized Index of Consumer Prices category Energy (ENRGY) is a classification of nondurable goods and energy that includes Electricity (04.5.1), Gas (04.5.2), Liquid Fuels (04.5.3), Solid Fuels (04.5.4), Heat Energy (04.5.5), and Fuels and Lubricants for Personal Transport Equipment (07.2.2).

Information provided in the notes pertaining to Special Aggregates HICP classifications can be found from the source here (https://ec.europa.eu/eurostat/cache/metadata/en/prc_hicp_esms.htm).
